title: California debts after divorce
question: If my spouse has a criminal restitution judgement in their name that they are responsible for, am I liable for half that judgement if we divorce?
question_tags: Divorce,Dividing debts in a divorce,Divorce and bankruptcy,Bankruptcy,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt,Criminal defense,Victim compensation and criminal conviction
answers: No, unless you wee also charged with and convicted of the crime.
